about_the_game:
Description:


Immerse yourself in a post-apocalyptic world teeming with zombies and hostile gangs in the game "All in Vain." Explore a vast open world, engage in diverse quests, and develop your survival strategy. Utilize an advanced crafting system and weapon customization to create unique items and enhance your combat prowess. Your decisions will determine your fate in this harsh and captivating adventure. Survive at all costs and prove that hope is not in vain!

Key Features:


Crafting:
Gather resources, explore the world, and create everything from simple tools to complex and deadly weapons. Your ingenuity is the key to survival.

Weapon Customization:
Upgrade and modify your weapons to suit your playstyle. Each part has its own significance, and the right choice can be crucial in battle.

Survival:
Fight for your life against bloodthirsty zombies and ruthless bandits. Manage hunger, thirst, and fatigue to stay battle-ready.

Open World:
Explore a vast world filled with diverse landscapes—from dense forests and majestic mountains to raging rivers and tranquil lakes. From small settlements to a sprawling metropolis, each location is meticulously detailed and full of dangers and opportunities. Find shelters, gather valuable resources, and uncover hidden spots to survive and thrive in this harsh world.

Enemies:
In your world, zombies vary in their abilities and characteristics. Some zombies are slow and weak, posing a smaller threat, while others are incredibly strong and powerful. Additionally, there are mutants—extremely powerful and dangerous creatures that require special strategies to defeat. Besides zombies, you'll encounter various factions, each with its own goals and motives. These groups will also be your enemies, creating additional obstacles and conflicts in your fight for survival.

Quests:
Complete a variety of tasks that will help you survive, find allies, and uncover the mysteries of the post-apocalyptic world. Quests range from resource gathering to complex missions requiring strategy and skill. Dive into intricate quests where you need to think through every step and find creative solutions to overcome dangerous traps and solve challenging puzzles.

Additional Features:


Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of a post-apocalyptic world with realistic graphics and immersive sound design. Explore detailed locations where every texture and sound creates the feeling of a real apocalypse.

Dynamic Day and Night Cycle: Experience the realism of a world where changing conditions affect your survival. Day brings new opportunities for exploration and resource gathering, while night introduces new dangers, forcing you to seek shelter and stay alert.

Weather Conditions: Feel the full force of nature with changing weather conditions such as strong winds, dense fog, and heavy rain. These factors not only alter your perception of the world but also significantly impact survival tactics, adding an extra layer of realism and challenges.

Cooperative Mode: Team up with friends in a cooperative multiplayer mode to tackle challenges together, share resources, and complete quests as a team.

"All in Vain" combines intense survival elements with rich storytelling and a dynamic, ever-changing world, offering players a thrilling and immersive post-apocalyptic experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-9100 / AMD Ryzen 3 2300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon™ RX 560 (4GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 or newer
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU running at 3.6 GHz or higher: AMD Ryzen 5 3600X or Intel i5-8600K or newer
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 GB VRAM, AMD RX 6700 XT / NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
